mapper.select: select dr.item_value AS school_step_name, d1.item_value AS school_name, d2.item_value AS step_name, SUM(totle_study) AS totle_study, CONCAT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(totle_study_length)),'') AS totle_study_length, round(sum(totle_study_length) / (sum(totle_study) * TIME_TO_SEC(v.video_time)) * 100,2) as study_rate, COUNT(1) AS view_num from (select s.edu_area, s.edu_school, s.edu_step, pl.lecture_id, COUNT(1) AS totle_study, SUM(pl.study_length) AS totle_study_length from sys_play_logs pl left JOIN class_type t on t.id = pl.class_type_id and t.origin_type=0 left join student s on s.user_id = pl.user_id and s.edu_identity = 0 where s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and t.company_id = #{companyId} group by pl.lecture_id, pl.user_id) td LEFT JOIN edu_step_school_relation r ON r.edu_school_code = td.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict dr ON r.edu_step_new_code = dr.item_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d1 ON d1.item_code = td.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d2 ON d2.item_code = td.edu_step LEFT JOIN course_video_lecture cl ON cl.id = td.`lecture_id` LEFT JOIN video v ON v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 group by r.edu_step_new_code,td.edu_school,td.edu_step order by r.edu_step_new_code,td.edu_school,td.edu_step limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

select t.name as course_name, ut.name as tea_name, COUNT(1) AS totle_study, concat(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(pl.study_length)),'') AS totle_study_length, round(SUM(pl.study_length) / (COUNT(pl.class_type_id) * TIME_TO_SEC(v.video_time)) * 100,2) as study_rate from sys_play_logs pl left JOIN class_type t on t.id = pl.class_type_id and t.origin_type=0 left join sys_config_teacher ut on ut.id = t.teacher_id left join student s on s.user_id = pl.user_id and s.edu_identity = 0 inner join users_front uf on uf.id = s.user_id left join course_video_lecture cl on cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` left join video v on v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 where s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and t.id = #{classTypeId} and t.name = #{courseName} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and t.company_id = #{companyId} group by pl.lecture_id order by pl.lecture_id limit #{firstIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (select pl.class_type_id from sys_play_logs pl left JOIN class_type t on t.id = pl.class_type_id and t.origin_type=0 left join sys_config_teacher ut on ut.id = t.teacher_id left join student s on s.user_id = pl.user_id and s.edu_identity = 0 left join edu_step_school_relation r on r.edu_school_code = s.edu_school left join sys_config_dict d on d.item_code = s.edu_area LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d1 on d1.item_code = s.edu_school LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it on it.item_code = t.item_third_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it1 on it1.item_code = t.item_second_code left join course_video_lecture cl on cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` left join video v on v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 where s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and r.edu_step_new_code = #{eduSchoolStep} and t.item_third_code = #{eduSubject} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and ut.name like '%${teaName}%' and t.company_id = #{companyId} group by pl.lecture_id) t

select count(1) from (select pl.user_id as totleNum from sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} and s.`edu_school` = #{eduSchool} group by pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id ) t

select CONCAT(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(pl.study_length)),'') AS totleStudyLength, count(1) as personNum from sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} and s.`edu_school` = #{eduSchool}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS userNum, sum(t.study_length) AS studyLength, d.item_value AS areaName, d.item_code AS eduArea FROM (SELECT s.user_id, sum(pl.study_length) as study_length, s.edu_area FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} GROUP BY pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id) t LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d ON d.`item_code` = t.edu_area GROUP BY d.`item_code` order by d.`item_code`

SELECT COUNT(1) AS userNum, sum(study_length) AS studyLength, d.item_value AS areaName, d.item_code AS eduArea FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d ON d.`item_code` = s.edu_area WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} GROUP BY d.`item_code` order by d.`item_code`

SELECT COUNT(1) AS userNum, d.item_value AS schoolName, d.item_code AS eduSchool FROM (SELECT s.user_id, s.edu_school FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 LEFT JOIN edu_step_school_relation r ON r.edu_school_code = s.edu_school WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} and r.edu_step_new_code = #{eduSchoolStep} GROUP BY pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id) t LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d ON d.`item_code` = t.edu_school GROUP BY d.`item_code` order by d.`item_code`

select d.`item_value` AS edu_area, d1.`item_value` AS edu_school, it.`item_name` AS edu_step, it1.`item_name` AS edu_subject, sum(totle_study) as totle_study, concat(SEC_TO_TIME(sum(totle_study_length)),'') as totle_study_length, round(sum(totle_study_length) / (sum(totle_study) * TIME_TO_SEC(video_time)) * 100,2) as study_rate, COUNT(1) as view_num from (SELECT s.edu_area, s.edu_school, pl.class_type_id, v.video_time, COUNT(1) AS totle_study, SUM(pl.study_length) AS totle_study_length FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 LEFT JOIN course_video_lecture cl ON cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` LEFT JOIN video v ON v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL AND s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by pl.lecture_id, pl.user_id) td LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d ON d.`item_code` = td.`edu_area` LEFT JOIN sys_config_dict d1 ON d1.`item_code` = td.`edu_school` LEFT JOIN class_type t ON t.id = td.`class_type_id` and t.origin_type=0 LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it ON it.`item_code` = t.`item_second_code` LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it1 ON it1.`item_code` = t.`item_third_code` GROUP BY td.`edu_area`, td.`edu_school`, t.`item_second_code`, t.`item_third_code` limit #{pageSize}

select COUNT(1) AS userNum, r.`edu_step_new_code` as schoolStepCode from (SELECT s.user_id, s.`edu_school` FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 where s.`edu_area` is not null and s.`edu_school` is not null and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} group by pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id) t LEFT JOIN `edu_step_school_relation` r ON r.`edu_school_code` = t.`edu_school` where r.`edu_school_code` is not null GROUP BY r.`edu_step_new_code` order by r.`edu_step_new_code`

SELECT COUNT(1) AS viewNum, d.`item_value` AS schoolName, d.`item_code` AS schoolCode FROM (SELECT s.user_id, s.`edu_school` FROM sys_play_logs pl LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and s.`edu_area` = #{eduArea} GROUP BY pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id) t LEFT JOIN `sys_config_dict` d ON d.`item_code` = t.`edu_school` GROUP BY d.`item_code` ORDER BY viewNum DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) AS viewNum, d.`item_value` AS schoolName, d.`item_code` AS schoolCode FROM (SELECT s.user_id, s.`edu_school` FROM sys_play_logs pl left join class_type t on t.id = pl.`class_type_id` and t.origin_type=0 LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and t.`item_third_code` = #{subjectCode} and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} GROUP BY pl.lecture_id,pl.user_id) t LEFT JOIN `sys_config_dict` d ON d.`item_code` = t.`edu_school` GROUP BY d.`item_code` ORDER BY viewNum desc LIMIT #{pageSize}

SELECT t.name, TIME_TO_SEC(v.video_time) as videoTime, concat(SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(pl.study_length)),'') AS totleStudyLength, round(SUM(pl.study_length) / (COUNT(pl.class_type_id) * TIME_TO_SEC(v.video_time)) * 100,2) as studyRate, COUNT(pl.user_id) AS totleStudy, v.video_cc_id as videoid FROM sys_play_logs pl left join class_type t on t.id = pl.`class_type_id` and t.origin_type=0 LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 left join course_video_lecture cl on cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` left join video v on v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and t.id = #{classId} and t.name = #{className} and t.`item_third_code` = #{subjectCode} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by pl.class_type_id

SELECT count(1) as deviceNum, device FROM sys_play_logs pl left join class_type t on t.id = pl.`class_type_id` and t.origin_type=0 LEFT JOIN student s ON s.user_id = pl.user_id AND s.edu_identity = 0 left join course_video_lecture cl on cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` left join video v on v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 WHERE s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and t.id = #{classId} and t.name = #{className} and t.`item_third_code` = #{subjectCode} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by pl.device

SELECT v.* FROM class_type t left join `class_type_module_relation` cr on t.id = cr.`class_type_id` left join `course_video_chapter` vc on vc.module_id = cr.`module_id` left join `course_video_lecture` vl on vl.`chapter_id` = vc.`id` left join video v on v.id = vl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 where v.id is not null and t.origin_type=0 and t.id = #{classId} and t.name = #{className} limit 1;

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM (select pl.class_type_id from sys_play_logs pl left JOIN class_type t on t.id = pl.class_type_id and t.origin_type=0 left join sys_config_teacher ut on ut.id = t.teacher_id left join student s on s.user_id = pl.user_id and s.edu_identity = 0 LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it on it.item_code = t.item_third_code LEFT JOIN sys_config_item it1 on it1.item_code = t.item_second_code left join course_video_lecture cl on cl.id = pl.`lecture_id` left join video v on v.id = cl.video_id and v.origin_type=0 where s.`edu_area` IS NOT NULL AND s.`edu_school` IS NOT NULL and s.delete_flag = 0 and s.edu_area = #{eduArea} and s.edu_school = #{eduSchool} and study_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and t.company_id = #{companyId} group by t.`item_second_code`, t.`item_third_code`) t

SELECT uh.id, uh.user_id, uh.commodity_id, uh.class_type_id, uh.lecture_id, uh.study_time, uh.study_length, TIME_TO_SEC(v.video_time) as video_time FROM user_history_all uh LEFT JOIN `course_video_lecture` cv ON cv.id = uh.`lecture_id` LEFT JOIN video v ON v.id = cv.`video_id` and v.origin_type=0 WHERE uh.user_id IS NOT NULL AND uh.commodity_id IS NOT NULL AND uh.class_type_id IS NOT NULL AND uh.lecture_id IS NOT NULL AND uh.study_time IS NOT NULL AND v.video_time IS NOT NULL
